issues.title: üì± Mobile Disaster: Customers Can't Order
issues.description: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
issues.businessImpact: 60% of restaurant orders come from mobile - this is costing you sales

opportunities: Competitors rank higher for delivery keywords

recommendations: Not appearing for "cafe near me", "cafe", "cafe delivery near me", "cafe Piedmont South Carolina", "cafe restaurant near me", "cafe food Piedmont" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords
Ranking below #1 for 2 keywords - increase customer reviews and engagement to improve rankings
Low Local Pack visibility (25%) - audit your Google My Business completeness, categories, and local citations

reviews.text:
Always like to support local businesses. The shrimp salad on toasted hoagie roll was delicious, perfect size. My husband had the shrimp burger, which was tasty, not full of breading filler. Owner so personable, each patron treated
as if only customers, which was not case, he was busy entire time we were there.

Military and first responders discounts offered.

We will definitely return.

We stopped in today for our first visit to Coastal Cafe & Creamery. It definitely won't be our last!
First, the owner will great you and will gladly answer any questions, tell you where the fresh seafood comes from, history of the recipes he uses. I enjoyed the conversation!
We started off with the Shem Creek Crab Dip. Very good and a hit of spicy, loved it!
Next was the Costal Crab & Corn Chowder.   Its very flavorful and a dash of OldBay on top makes it perfect.
I had the Port Royal Pimento Burger. The pimento cheese was spot on, but honestly the burger patty was just ok. I'll try something else next visit.
My girlfriend had the Stone Shrimp Burger. Now this was something special!  You can tell it's loaded with Shrimp and not some sort of bread filler. I definitely recommend this burger.
The tater tots seemed to be air fried, and not greasy.
They also have Hershey brand ice cream for dessert. We didn't try that though because of the good portions, we were full!
That's another reading to come back üòÜ

Everything here is incredible.  The owner and staff are always friendly, kind, and helpful.  The food is fantastic.  I can‚Äôt get enough of the spicy pimento cheese, but no matter what I have tried it‚Äôs always delicious.  Support local businesses, and have a delectable meal or treat.  I would eat here EVERY day if I could.

Amazing atmosphere, Amazing food. Amazing folks!

I can‚Äôt wait to come back and try more food. Not only do they serve amazing quality food, they serve our community! If you want to support a small family owned business look NO FURTHER!

They offer Military, First responder & A Teacher discount!! How amazing is that? The owner is a Veteran & their son is in the military as well! I love the fact they support our Troops.

10/10 Cannot stress that enough!

I feel I just walked into a beachfront ice cream parlor and I LOVE the decor, atmosphere and The Owner is so kind and beach professional.  My grandchildren and I visit there almost EVERY Tuesday.  Please tell everyone they MUST try the DELICIOUS Ice Cream and food at The Coastal Cafe and Creamery in Easley, SC!!!!

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.author: Vicki
recentReviews.text: I feel I just walked into a beachfront ice cream parlor and I LOVE the decor, atmosphere and The Owner is so kind and beach professional.  My grandchildren and I visit there almost EVERY Tuesday.  Please tell everyone they MUST try the DELICIOUS Ice Cream and food at The Coastal Cafe and Creamery in Easley, SC!!!!

recentReviews.author: C Merck
recentReviews.text: Everything here is incredible.  The owner and staff are always friendly, kind, and helpful.  The food is fantastic.  I can‚Äôt get enough of the spicy pimento cheese, but no matter what I have tried it‚Äôs always delicious.  Support local businesses, and have a delectable meal or treat.  I would eat here EVERY day if I could.

recentReviews.author: Scott Tulk
recentReviews.text:
We stopped in today for our first visit to Coastal Cafe & Creamery. It definitely won't be our last!
First, the owner will great you and will gladly answer any questions, tell you where the fresh seafood comes from, history of the recipes he uses. I enjoyed the conversation!
We started off with the Shem Creek Crab Dip. Very good and a hit of spicy, loved it!
Next was the Costal Crab & Corn Chowder.   Its very flavorful and a dash of OldBay on top makes it perfect.
I had the Port Royal Pimento Burger. The pimento cheese was spot on, but honestly the burger patty was just ok. I'll try something else next visit.
My girlfriend had the Stone Shrimp Burger. Now this was something special!  You can tell it's loaded with Shrimp and not some sort of bread filler. I definitely recommend this burger.
The tater tots seemed to be air fried, and not greasy.
They also have Hershey brand ice cream for dessert. We didn't try that though because of the good portions, we were full!
That's another reading to come back üòÜ

recentReviews.author: Kaylin Babb
recentReviews.text:
Amazing atmosphere, Amazing food. Amazing folks!

I can‚Äôt wait to come back and try more food. Not only do they serve amazing quality food, they serve our community! If you want to support a small family owned business look NO FURTHER!

They offer Military, First responder & A Teacher discount!! How amazing is that? The owner is a Veteran & their son is in the military as well! I love the fact they support our Troops.

10/10 Cannot stress that enough!

recentReviews.author: Kathy Barnett
recentReviews.text:
Always like to support local businesses. The shrimp salad on toasted hoagie roll was delicious, perfect size. My husband had the shrimp burger, which was tasty, not full of breading filler. Owner so personable, each patron treated
as if only customers, which was not case, he was busy entire time we were there.

Military and first responders discounts offered.

We will definitely return.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 5.0/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the personable and attentive service from the owner, who treats each patron as if they are the only customers, enhancing their dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The Coastal Cafe & Creamery offers generous portions of delicious, fresh seafood dishes that keep customers coming back for more. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The restaurant's support for military, first responders, and teachers through discounts is highly appreciated by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
